The Roman history from the building of the city to the perfect settlement of the empire by Augustus Caesar containing the space of 727 years : design'd as well for the understanding of the Roman authors as the Roman affairs / by Laurence Echard ... Echard, Laurence, 1670?-1730.
The second edition, carefully revis'd and much improv'd.
[23], 452, [22] p., [1] leaf of plate : ill.
Printed by T. Hodgkin for M. Gillyflower ... and R. Parker ..., London : MDCXCVI [1696]
Contains frontispiece. Includes index. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
